name: Weapon Specialization, Mythic

sections.body: When using your chosen weapon, you gain a bonus equal to half your tier on damage rolls. This stacks with the bonus from Weapon Specialization and Greater Weapon Specialization.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: If you have taken non-mythic Weapon Specialization multiple times, you must choose which of those feats this enhances. You can take this feat multiple times. The effects do not stack. Each time you take this feat, it applies to a different non-mythic Weapon Specialization feat you have.
sections.name: Special

description: The damage you deal with your chosen weapon is truly awesome to behold.
